DOC.brief_summary: Aim of this study is to assess lung specific elastance in a population of pediatric patients with Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome (ARDS) treated with mechanical ventilation, and in a pediatric population of ICU patients with healthy lung which are treated with mechanical ventilation for other clinical purposes.
DOC.brief_title: The Specific Elastance in ARDS Patients: a Pediatric Study
DOC.criteria: ARDS (Berlin Definition Criteria) or mechanical ventilation in healthy lungs Hemodynamic instability Lung diseases other than ARDS Parental refuse
